Class PlayerService

java.lang.Object
com.hexaforce.warzone.services.PlayerService
public class PlayerService extends Object
This service class handles the players.

    • isPlayerNameUnique

      public boolean isPlayerNameUnique(List<Player> p_existingPlayerList, String p_playerName)
      Checks if player name is exists in given existing player list.
      Parameters:
      p_existingPlayerList - existing players list present in game
      p_playerName - player name which needs to be looked upon
      Returns:
      boolean true if player name is unique, false if its not

    • addRemovePlayers

      public List<Player> addRemovePlayers(List<Player> p_existingPlayerList, String p_operation, String p_argument)
      This method is used to add and remove players.
      Parameters:
      p_existingPlayerList - current player list.
      p_operation - operation to add or remove player.
      p_argument - name of player to add or remove.
      Returns:
      return updated list of player.

      Returns:

      p_continents - list of all available continents

      Integer armies to be assigned to player
